input.text_prompt:
System / Context:
You are an expert Senior Java Software Engineer specializing in desktop application development using JavaFX 25 and Java 24. Your task is to generate a production-ready, fully functional desktop application based on the provided Technical Specifications, Functional Requirements, and UI Assets.
Technical Constraints & Environment:
JDK Version: Java 24.
Library: OpenJFX 25.0.1.
Build Tool: Maven 3.9.11.
Code Completeness: You must provide the full, compilable source code. Do not use placeholders like // ... rest of code. Do not omit imports.
Visuals: Do not use external image files (PNG/JPG). Use the provided SVG XML code blocks for all icons to ensure the app runs immediately without missing assets.
Project Scope:
Application Name: Age calculator app
Description: This app calculates a person’s age based on a selected date of birth and a chosen current date. It computes the exact difference in years, months, and days, and displays the result instantly.
Section 1: Functional Requirements:
Implement the following logic strictly. The code must satisfy every ID listed below:
FR1.1: The system must allow the user to input their Date of Birth (DOB).
FR1.2: The DOB input field must include a calendar icon, suggesting a date-picker functionality for easy selection.
FR1.3: The system must allow the user to input the Current Date (or comparison date).
FR1.4: The Current Date input field must include a calendar icon, suggesting a date-picker functionality.
FR1.5: The system must prevent calculation if the Date of Birth is later than the Current Date.
FR1.6: Both the DOB and Current Date fields must have a clear, valid default format (e.g., MM/DD/YYYY).
FR2.1: The system must initiate the age calculation process when the user clicks the "Calculate" button.
FR2.2: The system must calculate the difference between the Date of Birth and the Current Date in terms of Years, Months, and Days.
FR2.3: The calculation must provide the age in whole years, followed by the remaining whole months, and then the remaining days.
FR2.4: The system must handle date validation and display an error message if either date field is left blank or contains an invalid format.
FR3.1: The system must clearly display the calculated total whole age in Years.
FR3.2: The system must clearly display the number of remaining Months since the last birthday.
FR3.3: The system must clearly display the number of remaining Days since the last full month.
Section 2: UI & Wireframe Specifications:
The GUI must strictly adhere to the attached visual wireframe.
Layout Structure:
Header Section
A full-width top banner with a solid teal background.
Center-aligned title text: “Age Calculator” in bold.
Form Section
A vertical layout containing two date-input rows. Each row includes a label on the left and a date input field on the right.
Date of Birth
Left-aligned bold label: “Date of Birth”.
To the right, a date input field.
A calendar icon is positioned at the end of the date input field.
Current Date
Left-aligned bold label: “Current Date”.
To the right, a date input field.
A calendar icon is positioned at the end of the date input field.
Action Button
A centered button with a teal background and rounded corners.
Centered bold text on the button: “Calculate”.
Results Section
Below the button is a horizontal row of three rectangular result boxes, evenly spaced.
Each box contains:
A centered label at the top (“Years”, “Months”, “Days”).
A centered number beneath the label.
Styling: Strictly mimic the color palette, typography, corner roundness, and element spacing visible in the attached wireframe image. The visual output should look as close to the image as possible.
Window Size: 1440 width x 1024 height.
Section 3: Graphic Assets (SVG code):
Use the following SVG XML code blocks for the application icons:
Calendar_icon: <svg width="43" height="47" viewBox="0 0 43 47" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <path d="M30.25 1V10M12.25 1V10M1 19H41.5M5.5 5.5H37C39.4853 5.5 41.5 7.51472 41.5 10V41.5C41.5 43.9853 39.4853 46 37 46H5.5C3.01472 46 1 43.9853 1 41.5V10C1 7.51472 3.01472 5.5 5.5 5.5Z" stroke="#1E1E1E" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/> </svg>
Output Deliverables:
Provide the output in the following format:
pom.xml: Complete Maven configuration.
Main.java: The entry point extending Application.
Controller/View Classes: If separating concerns, provide clearly marked files.
styles.css: (If used).
